ygData.subject: How bad a mistake?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, Being a newbie to the whole MUD/D&D/Everquest thing I rushed  online created a character and started playing. What I did not know about were the 20 bonus
ygData.messageBody:
Ok,

Being a newbie to the whole MUD/D&D/Everquest thing I rushed online created a character and started playing.

What I did not know about were the 20 bonus points that you can put into STR, STA, AGI DEX....

Should I have been allowed to continue?
Were the places to put them chosen for me if I do not place them somewhere?
Can I go back and choose now?
Or am I now Zahlhedren the permenantly Crippled Enchanter of Norrath?



Thanks in advance...
